website_summaries.verdict: Everything you could want from a robotic vacuum. The extra large dust bin sets the Standard bob apart from its competitors.
pros: Offers a simple yet effective design
When the battery reaches 15%, the bob returns to its home charging station
The dust bin is quite large, holding up to 1 liter of dust and debris
cons: Design isn't as aesthetically pleasing as many of the other models

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed! I have 2 dogs and 2 cats, so you pet lovers know the amount of hair that accumulates. Bob has no problem sweeping it up and the dander and dust too. I've noticed that I don't have to dust as often, I do exercise Bob every other day and he has really made a difference in keeping things more tidy. I find that keeping Bob clean keeps him running well. I do empty the dustbin on a regular basis after every use. I had a concern regarding Bob's behavior so I called the support team and I was extremely impressed with their efficiency. What a refreshing surprise!!!
customer_reviews.author: gina

customer_reviews.title: This thing is useless....
customer_reviews.text: I broke my leg and cant walk or use a vacuum for a few weeks, but I have kids and pets so I needed to find a solution. This vacuum was NOT it. BOB is big and bulky and useless. It does not fit under any of my furniture or in between because it is so large. It seems confused and just goes in circles in the same room and gets stuck on everything! It doesnt transistion from our tile to carpet so we can only run it on 1/3 on my single story house. I went to return it so I can get the $250.00+ back and now they want me to pay for return shipping too!!!!
customer_reviews.author: The Shaunna P. (Untaming Alice)

customer_reviews.title: great tech support
customer_reviews.text: ran great for 8 months than had a sensor problem, contacted bob sweep tech, with in less than a week new sensor was sent and easy to install and bob is healthy and up and running again. Great support and great little robot, works as good as the costly irumba
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Cellmer

customer_reviews.title: but poor litte bob got stuck EVERYWHERE
customer_reviews.text: I was hopeful with the positive reviews, but poor litte bob got stuck EVERYWHERE! He couldn't get over any of the transitions from carpet to hard floor in our house and he kept getting stuck under the couch. He didn't get all the way under it, but would push himself in just enough to not be able to get back out again. Guess I have to go back to the old fashioned way of it!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Anne

customer_reviews.title: Not good.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a horrible vacuum and it doesn’t go in any particular direction to get the whole floor clean, Bob’s drunk. It’s complicated to figure out how to use as mop and I’m very underwhelmed.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie Defee

customer_reviews.title: Like it enough to purchase a second one.
customer_reviews.text: Love the way the bobsweep works. However, I bought one two years ago and the wheels are disintegrating..I have to purchase new qheels.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: but we love using this as a vacuum
customer_reviews.text: The mop feature is a bit of a cop out, but we love using this as a vacuum. We have two furry animals and this handles the hair pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: SvenskaSpark

customer_reviews.title: It is much better than the Roomba I had before Bobsweep
customer_reviews.text: It is much better than the Roomba I had before Bobsweep. The best feature is that I can control its direction using the remote control. The large chamber is very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Maqbool Qurashi

customer_reviews.title: A working moms best friend
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I made this purchase! Every house needs one. As a working mom the last thing I want to do on top of all my other daily tasks is vacuum but with a little under one it's a necessity because everything goes in her mouth. This vacuum is set to vacuum every morning at 6 am before we get up for the day so it picks up yesterday's mess and makes the floor baby friendly. The one down fall about hard floors and pets is regardless of how many time your vacuum you still have dirty feet but this vacuum has resolved that issue. I've had it a couple days and I am in love!!
customer_reviews.author: Avonlea Aurentz

customer_reviews.title: The first one I got didn’t work and the replacement ...
customer_reviews.text: The first one I got didn’t work and the replacement seemed to work alright but the sensors are giving out and there is a small lip from my kitchen to my living room that it can’t get over so I can’t even use it now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bob take two
customer_reviews.text: Second order, the first Bob had some issues. This Bob has been great! Such a great timesaver and with 3 dogs it really does get the job done! Bob does his thing almost every day, better then me!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda DunaheeMueller

customer_reviews.title: My best cleaning purchase yet!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!! Best purchase I have made. He struggles with the stairs and with get caught on like a phone charger cord if laying out but does an amazing job. My floors are clean everyday!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Grundy

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It's really good keeps my floors clean and gets all that dust that gets under the bed places you can't reach. I haven't had to use a broom since I got it.i really enjoy
customer_reviews.author: sara rivera

customer_reviews.title: Bobsweep worked fine, until 2 days after the one month return ...
customer_reviews.text: Bobsweep worked fine, until 2 days after the one month return date. Then he quit. A lot of money for something that only lasts 1 month.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Stuck

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It cleans and mops very well. My only complaint is that it won't do the dishes!!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Fattig

customer_reviews.title: Can’t adjust to different heights above it...
customer_reviews.text: Works really good but keeps trying to go the same direction and gets stuck... it’s sensors don’t react to the levels above..bob kept getting stuck under our entertainment center... perfect for open spaces without obstacles
customer_reviews.author: batine ramirez

customer_reviews.title: My best friend Bob!
customer_reviews.text: I have had my Bobsweep for about 2 years now, and he is part of the family. I wouldn't want to experience housework without him
customer_reviews.author: MICHELLE SHAW

customer_reviews.title: gets stuck easily on any
customer_reviews.text: Tried everything...Doesn't sync/return to home station....gets stuck easily on any object
customer_reviews.author: jack quarles

customer_reviews.title: Making my life easier
customer_reviews.text: Love the programming options and remote - he works every morning while I am gone. The bigger size keeps him from getting into places that cause problems like under the bed or dresser where lamp cables sit.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: it gets stuck a lot and it ate it's wire
customer_reviews.author: Majelica

customer_reviews.title: Clogs easily
customer_reviews.text: When we first received this item I was super excited, it seemed to clean really well. After the first use it started clogging regularly. The design is flawed, and more often than not the dirt and dog hair that is supposed to end up in the collection bin gets stuck behind the spinning bar and never makes it into the collection bin. I really really wanted to love this vacuum but I truly believe there is a major flaw in its design. In order for it to clean properly my husband has to take it apart at least once a week to clean it, which kind of takes all the fun out of having a robot that vacuums.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan Bowyer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: excellent for in-between cleaning on bare floors and carpet.Very easy to program and maintain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Throws codes a lot on tile flooring. Saves me tons of time sweeping!
customer_reviews.author: Mindi

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does a pretty good job but is loud when it runs.
customer_reviews.author: Christine kent

customer_reviews.title: I found the company to be excellent in communications
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 pets and bobsweep seems to help me a lot with all my hardwood floors. It collects so much hair and dirt. I recently had a wheel problem and was able to send the product back for servicing. I found the company to be excellent in communications, timely in sending the machine back to me and great even with follow-up after that! I am very satisfied with company and product. It was worth the cost - and my cats and dog like watching it, too!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like the product, when it works. PROS: cleans well, eliminates the need to constantly sweep CONS: LOUD!, can't set multiple cleaning times, has trouble on dark floors even when using the blindfold stickers I would recommend if you are on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: We love Bob!
customer_reviews.text: I love this new member of the family. Single floor ranch home. Transfers from hardwoods to carpet easily! Can be "directed" with the remote control. Has full 1 liter trash bin! I still sweep with a real sweeper but run Bob at least once a day! He's a great help! Two dogs and two cats!
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Works and look good. Comes in nice packaging with everything you need ...
customer_reviews.text: Works and look good. Comes in nice packaging with everything you need to get it going . Set up is very easy literally took 2 minutes to screw in the brush and hook up the charging station the noise level is all right except when it bounces into the legs of the table. coverage is random but looks like it covers almost the whole area in one run
customer_reviews.author: Lin K.

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best purchases I've ever made! Now I can save so much time and spend for my family instead of vacuum cleaning. I love the design btw.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love Bob. I have two dogs and a cat ...
customer_reviews.text: I love Bob. I have two dogs and a cat so my house gets dirty quickly. Bob picks it all up (dirt, pet hair, dust, etc). I love being able to set a timer and come home to a clean home. I can walk through out my house barefoot again!
customer_reviews.author: RM88

customer_reviews.title: Love Bob! Took me time to get the full ...
customer_reviews.text: Love Bob! Took me time to get the full use out of him. I rarely use my upright vacuum any more. It iis a great help with dog hair. We have 2 dogs and they tend to make a mess!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer - S. Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Such a Great Vacuum cleaner!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just got my bObsweep about 1 day ago and I tried it right away- all I can say is OMG!!!!I really love it !!!It picks up every little bit of dust and dirt in my apt !!!
customer_reviews.author: Inha

customer_reviews.title: Needs a lot of attention
customer_reviews.text: Found the unit to be large, loud and klunky. Did NOT fit under sofas and coffee table, which was a big disappointment. Jammed constantly and needed a lot of attention (removal of hair from rotating brush, clean wheels, un-jam unit from getting caught in rug fringes, getting stuck under cabinets). Cleaned only moderately well. I felt like it was high maintenance.
customer_reviews.author: Maryjane Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the old fashion way better. Hard to figure out how it works
customer_reviews.author: Dana Whiteside

customer_reviews.title: The Bob
customer_reviews.text: It's great wish it had a little carrier for floor cleaner cause it dries up quick.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Problem with this unity
customer_reviews.text: My Friends, I bought from Amazon one Bobsweep serial number, 1000-1511-CH0B-1892 and I did the registration as soon as I get it, but I didn't received any confirmation, now I'm having problem with my unity and I'd like to get my money back. Is not working properly, keeping stop just after start working with error 4. Please help me to receiv my money Back Paulo Carvalho
customer_reviews.author: Paulo Carvalho

customer_reviews.title: Not a set and forget vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This was a decent vacuum but the "ai" still has a long way to go. There is no way to keep it out of certain rooms and with in the first 5min Bob got himself stuck under a end table. When I dislodged him and turned him 180 degrees in the other direction, it only took 2 min for him to wedge himself back in the same end table. So this is not a set and forget vacuum I find myself babysitting him. I bought bob to replace my old roomba but the lower profile of the roomba made him reach more places. But neither was a set and forget:l
customer_reviews.author: DJC

customer_reviews.title: Best robot on the market
customer_reviews.text: It works well and Bob has great customer support, however like all robotic cleaners there are limitations. For example, in my house the cabinets are low to the ground so Bob can't clean under them very well. Also we have a lot of furniture and cords, which means we have to help Bob by sweep things toward him and using the remote to keep him from getting stuck. I really want something I can just turn on and ignore-this doesn't exist yet. We also had issues with hair wrapping around the wheels. Having said that if you are trying decide between several robotic vacuums- this is the one to get based on customer support alone. The price is good, too.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Valuable purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Couldn't give it five stars due to the fact it has to be monitored. It gets stuck on furniture and can't get in tight corners. I love how it keeps the dog hair picked up and sanitizes with a UV light. It was worth buying for my needs and I would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Frustrated review
customer_reviews.text: I had surgery a few weeks ago and could not vacuum. Want a device that would do that job for me. My floors are stained concrete with area rugs and carpet. bObsweep is great on my concrete floors, but every time it hits the edges of my area rugs, it gets stuck. I have to physically move it so that it continues. From the other reviews, it didn't sound like that was an issue. It's okay and I'll continue to use it, but at least I know I have to unstick it for it to continue. Not sure if other brands do the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: youngoba

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love my bObsweep
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my bObsweep! Having a full tile home it can be hard to constantly keep the floors clean and I hate the feeling of dirty feet. This vacuum ensures that I come home to clean floors which I love. I've used it for several weeks and he hasn't gotten stuck once. I haven't used the mop function yet but I bought it mostly for the dirt/dust that my son brings in. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Hope L.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic gift! Bob does take some time to adjust ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic gift! Bob does take some time to adjust to your floor setting, so be patient and leave the room; otherwise, he’ll think that you’re part of a wall and it will crate hiccups for future cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Cas

customer_reviews.title: Bobsweep has the best customer service. hands down.
customer_reviews.text: The best. I have two and love them both. I bought this one for my brother and his wife as a house warming/ birthday gift. They love it too
customer_reviews.author: M. Arab

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and works
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and works. The only error is human error when you leave cords and other object that get tangled. No need to vacuum or clean the floors anymore. Bob works
customer_reviews.author: heidi M.

customer_reviews.title: vs. Roomba
customer_reviews.text: I haved owned two Roombas and now this Bobsweep. The two Roombas each lasted about three years, then the batteries died. I have had the Bobsweep for two months and I'm happy with it. It is quieter than Roomba. I don't think it does quite as good a job removing dirt as Roomba, but more than adequate. It has uv light cleaning to kill bacteria, Roomba did not. It is a good deal cheaper than a Roomba. I rated it five stars because I got it on sale for $199 and for the reasons listed above.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works good but not as I expected. Overall I am happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lena Sonkin

customer_reviews.title: Though I like my bobsweep
customer_reviews.text: Though I like my bobsweep, I have not been able to find or buy replacement side brushes, which makes it pretty useless. I don't live in US and cant find generic brand to fit either, so a waste of money. Check on parts availability BEFORE you buy. Lesson learned. and yes, I checked the manufacturer, where one brush is ridiculously expensive as often as it needs to be replaced., and they won't ship intl.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: bObsweep Standard Robotic Vacuum, Circle D 13.8, Champagne
product_meta.description: Size:Circle D 13.8| Color:ChampagneLife is clean when Bob takes care of the chores. This robot vacuum can sweep, vacuum, mop, filtrate, and shine UV light simultaneously. His 1100 mL dustbin holds tons of pet hair and has a filter for capturing tiny particles. You can schedule him to clean automatically each day of the week. When his battery runs low, Bob automatically starts looking for his charging station.
feature_bullets: Just like his shape, Bob is a well-rounded cleaner fit for every home. Bob vacuums, sweeps, mops, shines UV-C light, and filtrates particles to tackle dirt and germs.
His 1100 mL dustbin gives him an insatiable appetite for dirt and pet hair. Many robot vacuums have a dustbin size of 500mL or smaller.
Bob's extra long main brush covers 11 inches in just a single sweep, and his side brush reaches those corners with 12 arms. His highly efficient dual-filter captures small particles.

Bob obeys the cleaning schedule you give him for any and all days of the week. He cleans many types of floors including hardwood, tile, and carpet while avoiding stairs and cliffs,  and returns to his charging station when low on battery.
Bob is backed by a 1-year limited warranty, 5 years of subsidized service, and an amazing, US-based support team.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars144 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
specifications.Material Care Instructions: Empty dustbin, clean brush & wash mop rag after each use
specifications.Warranty Description: 2-year manufacturer's limited warranty on battery, 1-year manufacturer's limited warranty on all other parts and labor.
specifications.Included Components: Remote Control included, Charging Station included, Charging Adapter included, Batteries included
